derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French armoierie (see armoury)

sentences.sentence: "he dipped into his intellectual armory to find an answer"

means.word_mean: 2. all the weapons and equipment that a country has
3. a military structure where arms and ammunition and other military equipment are stored and training is given in the use of arms
4. a place where arms are manufactured

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的"; 2. 表名词,"场所,范围"

stems_affixes.word_buile: obligate有责任的;使负义务+ory……的→adj.强制性的,义务的
per全部+empt拿走+ory……的→全部拿走→专横的
re反+fract打碎+ory……的→反过来打碎→宁愿折碎了也不弯
cremat焚烧+ory场所,范围→n.火葬场 adj.火葬的
